Lyric:
[00:08.910]I let it fall, my heart
[00:12.640]And as it fell, you rose to claim it
[00:17.250]It was dark and I was over
[00:21.350]Until you kissed my lips and you saved me
[00:26.160]My hands, they were strong
[00:30.090]but my knees were far too weak
[00:35.010]To stand in your arms
[00:38.910]without falling to your feet
[00:43.380]But there's a side to you
[00:45.950]that I never knew, never knew
[00:48.170]All the things you'd say
[00:50.330]they were never true, never true
[00:52.510]And the games you'd play
[00:54.920]you would always win, always win
[00:58.360]But I set fire to the rain
[01:03.400]Watched it pour as I touched your face
[01:07.850]Well, it burned while I cried
[01:10.050]'Cause I heard it screaming out your name
[01:14.760]your name

[02:23.970]the last time
